remarks: Move scalar multiplication to outside of inner product.  See ~ his35 . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Oct-2015.)
statement:
cphipcj.h $e |- ., = ( .i ` W ) $.
cphipcj.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
cphass.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
cphass.k $e |- K = ( Base ` F ) $.
cphass.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` W ) $.
cph2ass $p |- ( ( W e. CPreHil /\ ( A e. K /\ B e. K ) /\ ( C e. V /\ D e. V ) ) -> ( ( A .x. C ) ., ( B .x. D ) ) = ( ( A x. ( * ` B ) ) x. ( C ., D ) ) ) $.
